resources.string: Install the Pebble watch app, then just close this and use your Pebble to start your phone ringing.
Maybe you lost you\'re watch after ringing your phone, maybe other things, use this to silence your phone!
Install the watch app to your Pebble. Come back here to install updates as they are released.
